post.content:
Dear Chil-Hoan:



I hope all is well with you.



My name is Jason Park, an associate with Pacific Bridge, Inc. (PBI). As you may know, PBI is a recruiting company focused on placing bilingual/bicultural candidates in excellent jobs in Asia (www.pacificbridge.com).



I am contacting you because our database lists you as a Korean speaker.  Our client, a leading manufacturer and supplier of battery separators for rechargeable lithium batteries is currently seeking an Account Manager for their office in Seoul, Korea.  The job description is listed below and can also be accessed at http://www.pacificbridge.com/job/html/10284.htm.  Remuneration for this position will be around US$100K.



If you are qualified for this position, please email your resume and cover letter to jasonpark@pacificbridge.com or fax them to 301-469-3409. If you know of an individual who would be interested in this position, please feel free to forward this email to them.  



Thanks and best regards,

Jason Park

Recruiting Associate

Pacific Bridge, Inc.

jasonpark@pacificbridge.com





Job Title: Account Manager



Location: Seoul, South Korea



Languages: Korean, English



Company Profile:

Our client is a leading manufacturer and supplier of battery separators for rechargeable lithium batteries.  They are currently seeking an Account Manager for Korea.  



The position will be located in Seoul and will report to the Vice President of Sales located in the US.



The company has manufacturing facilities in the US and China serving global markets, with Sales Offices in Japan, Korea and China.  The company employs highly skilled technical and business professionals to drive technology and business development.



Responsibilities:

·         Formulate account strategies.

·         Develop sustainable supply positions with major Korean Li-2 battery accounts (Samsung, LG)

·         Develop and maintain relationships with customers’ key decision makers and organizational leadership.

·         Manage customer accounts.

·         Develop and achieve annual sales budget, including customer mix, product mix, pricing.

·         Negotiate price/volume supply contracts and monitor price/value of the company’s products vs. competition.

·         Provide regular reports on sales activities and forecasts (revenue, product mix).

·         International travel to headquarters in the US (1 – 2 times per year).

·         Provide inputs on new product development, marketing and product positioning plans.



Qualifications:

·         4-year degree in a technical field.  

·         10 plus years of sales experience in technical value added sales, preferably in battery, electronics or electrochemical industries.  

·         Must have key account experience with large major Korean chaebols (Samsung, LG, Hyundai, etc.) or large multi-national accounts.  

·         Must be able to develop account strategies and plans, forecast sales and negotiate contracts.

·         Must be fluent in the Korean language and have good English language capability (Writing, Reading, Listening & Speaking).  

·         Japanese language capability (basic level) is preferred.  

·         Needs knowledge of Korean Customs.



To Apply:

Please send your resume and cover letter to Jason Park at jasonpark@pacificbridge.com.  No phone calls please.
post.title: Account Manager position for Seoul
